import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useState } from "react"; function ComputerLanguage() { const [LanguageContainer, setLanguageContainer] = useState('var(--mainBgcolor)') const [mainContainerText, setmainContainerText] = useState('#212329') const [myLanguageHeader, setmyLanguageHeader] = useState('white') const [LanguageHeader, setLanguageHeader] = useState('transparent') const DarkMode = () => { if (LanguageContainer === 'black') { setLanguageContainer('var(--mainBgcolor)') setmainContainerText('#212329') setmyLanguageHeader('white') setLanguageHeader('transparent') } else { setLanguageContainer('black') setmainContainerText('white') setmyLanguageHeader('var(--MyDarkGrayBg)') setLanguageHeader('1px solid gray') } } return (

Overview of Python Data Structure & Data type Input & Output

Indentation The If statement and its’ related statement The while loop
The For loop The range statement Break &Continue

introduction Components and Events

); } export default ComputerLanguage
